siteMetadata.about: A passionate programmer and results-oriented app developer with more than two year of experience in both development and research positions. I am self-driven and hungry to learn new technologies and strategies from this rapidly changing industry. My main focus is to maintain proper guidelines and architecture while developing apps. Strong eye for detail and tenacity to never quit on something until it is absolutely perfect.
